text: Marco Vicario (born 20 September 1925) is an Italian movie actor, screenwriter, movie producer and director. He appeared in 23 movies between 1950 and 1958. He is known for his roles in 7 uomini d'oro (1965), Il grande colpo dei 7 uomini d'oro (1966) and Wifemistress (1977). ==Other websites== * * Category:1925 births Category:Living people Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian movie directors Category:Italian movie producers Category:Italian screenwriters Category:Actors from Rome
title: Marco Vicario
